'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an [ability](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAbilities/) in {{poe2}}.

## Description

{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}

## Effects

{{#var:effects_formatted}}

## Items

* [Lance of the Midwood Stag](/lanceOfTheMidwoodStag/) ([Warrior of the Forest](/warriorOfTheForest/), [Lord of the Forest](/lordOfTheForest/)): Casts [Woodskin](/woodskinDeadfire/) when the wielder becomes Bloodied (25-50% Health) (1 per encounter)
* [Lance of the Midwood Stag](/lanceOfTheMidwoodStag/) ([Martyr of the Forest](/martyrOfTheForest/)): When defeated: Casts [Woodskin](/woodskinDeadfire/) to all nearby allies.
